Text: Bro. thanks for the rugby world cup coverage. would you please upload the fiji namabia game also
Thank you, thank you THANK YOU !!!!!!!!!

Thanks for all the great Rugby uploads.  I like to play them on PS3 if possible and while most of the ones you post I can some like this one I can't.  Not really wanting to transcode them but I noticed that the cappers for this one and the others are the same.  Do the cappers usually release in two different formats?
Cheers Shemyaza - many thanks for this.
Not able to follow the World Cup on dutch TV what a bummer, this is a great alternative, ta mate.
Mate, I am a USA eagles fan living in OZ. Could you upload those games as well? Thanks!

BRILLIANT! As always.
Many thanks for your tireless efforts to make rugby available to many of us who are locked out of the every-day rugby coverage...and in particular, the RWC!

Thank you so much for this. The RWC games are US$34.99 a game on Pay Per View here in Texas (Directv). You are brilliant.

Go Boks!!!
WOW amazing opening ceremony well done New Zealand
As usual, Shemyaza, you are my God. Please email me the address of your local pub so that I can send enough money to cover your rounds for the duration of the WC!
Thanks for this... your a legend!!!  GO THE ALL BLACKS!!!!!!!!!
Thanks so much for making this available mate, I know it's only just played, but will you be uploading the Australia vs Italy game?
wow.. Great job..!! Full coverage from the beginning...!!! High quality too... Keep up the good job..!! Thanks
